description: Something worth noticing is the six-pack Jimmie Slater has earned for himself. If you follow his Twitter you will have witnessed his progression, and seeing it flex in this scene proves his hard work at the gym has paid off. I think Nick Cross would agree with me: he’s a personal friend of Jimmie’s (you know, one of those personal friends you play with raw when there’s nothing else to do) and judging from 12:20, he certainly is enjoying Jimmie’s incredible body, most of all the hard cock. Nick and Jimmie are completely versatile, and Jimmie is first on the list to get dicked bare. The moment of initial anal penetration is always the most enjoyable to see, and Jimmie’s facial expression at 19:12 is an example of why. As for Nick Cross, well, he likes to ride it like a cowboy -- check it out at 37:25.
title: Jimmie Slater And Nick Cross Share Their Raw Cocks
